text: == Events == * January 1 - Eudocia Macrembolitissa marries the general Romanus Diogenes who becomes Byzantine Emperor * Emperor Go-Sanj≈ç ascends the throne of Japan * William the Conqueror takes Exeter, England after a brief siege * Saint Herfast becomes the first Lord Chancellor of England in London, England at the age of 68. He does the job for two years before he retires == Births == * September 1 - King Henry I of England, English royal (d. 1135)
